    Package Description
    org.turbogwt.core.http.client  
    org.turbogwt.core.http.client.serialization  
  • Classes in org.turbogwt.core.http.client.serialization used by org.turbogwt.core.http.client 
    Class and Description
    Deserializer
    Performs deserialization of Types.
    Serdes
    Performs serialization and deserialization of a type to/from plain text.
    SerdesManager
    Manager for registering and retrieving Serializers and Deserializers.
    Serializer
    Performs serialization of types.
  • Classes in org.turbogwt.core.http.client.serialization used by org.turbogwt.core.http.client.serialization 
    Class and Description
    DeserializationContext
    Context of deserialization.
    Deserializer
    Performs deserialization of Types.
    JsonBooleanSerdes
    Serdes of JSON booleans.
    JsonNumberSerdes
    Serdes of JSON numbers.
    JsonRecordReader
    This class provides useful methods for retrieving data from a JSON.
    JsonRecordWriter
    This class provides useful methods for building a JSON.
    JsonSerdes
    Base class for all SerDes that manipulates serialized JSON.
    JsonStringSerdes
    SerDes of JSON strings.
    JsonValueSerdes
    Base class for all SerDes that manipulates serialized JSON simple values.
    OverlaySerdes
    Serializer/Deserializer of Overlay types.
    Serdes
    Performs serialization and deserialization of a type to/from plain text.
    SerializationContext
    Context of serialization.
    SerializationException
    SerializationException is the superclass exception related to Serialization issues.
    Serializer
    Performs serialization of types.
    VoidSerdes
    SerDes for Void type.
